songs.title: Happy (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
Verse 1 [J.ReaL Hip Hop]

Something about this morning got me up high/
Like I'm up 3 stories floating & I'm not falling out the sky...I...might...just/
Take a walk around the clouds, jump down, then say "Hi!"/
How are you? Can I just say that I feel like I feel off of the bedroom's right side...Um...I/
Don't know what it is, or just what I did to get me on this level/
But I like it! I'm so excited! I might need to settle down a bit/
Nah, don't think that's happening captain! Put this down, I can't dream it! Beaming!/
Shining down, all around this town, I hope that you're seeing this! Greetings!/
And I open with season's greetings! Oh, oh, I'm pleased to meet cha'!/
Hopeful & peaceful feelings! Swinging so low, I'm reaching ceilings!/
And I'm solo, but we just chilling! Roll slow & keep it wheeling!/
We lending them some time, to keep it kosher & keep it le-git!/
Don't know if I need a reason, but I fo' sho believe I'm winning!/
And my whole home got season tickets, seen me get it, keep the vision/
Green & lemon, pink & lime & gold & silver, opal, yellow/
Focused! Peeling back the colors of my mind & throw em' here/
And there! And anywhere that I care to do it! I'ma share the love!/
Give it up! Live it up! Living lush & wonderous!/
Wondering what's next, but no matter what it is, I'mma be on that job!/
Cause I'm down for a minute, and I'm really gonna feel it the minute I get inside of that vibe! Nah!/
Put me up in that ride! Riiight! Turn me up on that dial! I'll...!/
Put you on to my style! While, you hook me up with your wildside!/
Blasting out that sound! Now, jump around in that crowd! Oww!/
Showin' up & show out! Get a little bit hype then bounce around, bow!/
So what you wanna do now? It's always looking up, whenever we get down!/
Watch me feet then watch my smile! Keep that head up, ain't no frowns!/
There's shadows or black clouds! No bad news around for miles!/
If you see some take em' out, on a date & meet the Mom!/
Ahh! I feel so the bomb! Blowing up, right on time!/
And the stuff I pack inside, probably make you lose your mind!/
And the new one you will find, hopefully, is just like mine!/
That's a whole different kind! Enjoying bliss & being kind! My!/
Hope that no one minds I remixed this instrumental/
And I grabbed my pens & pencils and went mental just to give you something/
That can make you giggle, dance & jump & skip when you feel crappy!/
In conclusion, I'm J.ReaL & God is good! Feel happy!/
Blue Monkey./


[Bridge x2]
Bring me down
Can’t nothing bring me down
Your love is too high to bring me down
Can’t nothing bring me down
I said...


[Hook x2]
Because I’m happy
Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof
Because I’m happy
Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth
Because I’m happy
Clap along if you know what happiness is to you
Because I’m happy
Clap along if you feel like that’s what you wanna do
